text: Hans Persson, born 18 January 1959, is a Swedish former cross-country skier. He was specialized at long-distance races. In 1984, he won Vasaloppet. He represented Ã…sarna IK at club level. With that club, he won the Swedish national relay championship in 1980-1983 and again in 1988. == References == Category:1959 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish skiers
title: Hans Persson
